TEXT.P: The scale you have entered will not generate a useful graph of the data set.

You should choose a minimum value for your X-axis that is equal to or a little smaller than the smallest "Stems per hectare" value in the data set. You should choose a maximum value that is equal to or a little larger than the largest "Stems per hectare" value.
Use a similar rule for the maximum and minimum values of "Hares per hectare" on the Y-axis.
